instructions.en:
Move the jungle hunter, jump over barrels and avoid the birds. Climb up the vines to the highest platform, then
press [LEFT] to axe the 3 bridge parts to defeat the gorilla.

Start the game by pressing [Mode],
then [Left] or [Right] to select Game A or Game B,
then press [Start] to start the game. You can use the keyboard cursors to move and up to jump.
